pkgmetadata.longdescription: The Intel Graphics Compute Runtime for OpenCL, informally known as NEO, is an open source project to converge Intel's development efforts on OpenCL compute stacks supporting Gen8 graphics devices (Broadwell architecture) and newer. For OpenCL support on Sandy Bridge, Ivy Bridge and Haswell architectures please have a look at dev-libs/beignet instead.

use.flag: Support the sharing of surfaces with Video Acceleration API (OpenCL Extension #36)
